hours_text:
We’re open May 1 – October 31, Wednesday through Sunday, from 11 am to 5 pm, and for special events.

_**We’re extending the same admission rates we offered in 2020-2022. In an effort to give as many people access to Goodell Gardens as possible, admission will be on a donation basis. If you’re able to donate in lieu of admission, please do so. We have donation bins located throughout the Gardens for your donation, or you can enter the Welcome Center/Gift Shop to make your donation there. Thank you**_.

We offer guided tours to groups at a rate of $5 per person (with reservation). Contact us at (814) 734-6699 for more information.

We also offer reciprocal admission to members of select public gardens, museums, nature centers, and other cultural institutions. To find out more, visit [www.goodellgardens.org/rap](http://web.archive.org/web/20251225021424/https://goodellgardens.org/rap).

Our gift shop accepts cash, checks and all major credit cards for purchases and admissions.

We’re open May 1 – October 31, Wednesday through Sunday, from 11 am to 5 pm, and for special events.

_**We’re extending the same admission rates we offered in 2020-2022. In an effort to give as many people access to Goodell Gardens as possible, admission will be on a donation basis. If you’re able to donate in lieu of admission, please do so. We have donation bins located throughout the Gardens for your donation, or you can enter the Welcome Center/Gift Shop to make your donation there. Thank you**_.
